doc:
Evelyn Boucher https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Evelyn_Boucher 0 Evelyn Boucher (1892–1991) was a British film actress who had a number of leading roles in silent films during the 1910s and 1920s appearing in films such as Tom Brown's Schooldays and The Man Who Bought London made at Catford Studios. She frequently worked with the director Floyd Martin Thornton. Evelyn_Boucher ( 1892 – 1991 ) was a_British_film_actress who had a_number of leading_roles in silent_films during the_1910s_and_1920s appearing in films such_as Tom_Brown 's_Schooldays and The_Man Who Bought London made at Catford_Studios . She frequently worked with the_director_Floyd_Martin_Thornton .
